metadata.name: D&D 5th Edition Character Sheet Generator
metadata.description: A comprehensive character sheet generator for Dungeons & Dragons Fifth Edition. Automatically rolls ability scores, calculates modifiers, and generates a complete character ready for play.
metadata.instructions: Roll on the `characterSheet` template to generate a complete character. The name field is left blank for you to fill in. All ability scores are rolled using 4d6 drop lowest.
